flavorText: Oculomancers see the ideal potion ingredient. The bats don't see it that way.

foreignData.flavorText: Okulomagier sehen darin die ideale Zutat für Tränke. Die Fledermäuse sehen das anders.
foreignData.name: Augenkreischer
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Wenn der Augenkreischer stirbt, lerne eine Lektion. (Du kannst eine Lektion-Karte von außerhalb der Partie, die du besitzt, offen vorzeigen und auf deine Hand nehmen, oder eine Karte abwerfen und dann eine Karte ziehen.)

foreignData.flavorText: Los oculomantes los ven como el ingrediente ideal para las pociones. Los murciélagos no lo ven de la misma manera.
foreignData.name: Murciélojo
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
Cuando el Murciélojo muera, aprende. (Puedes mostrar una carta de Lección de la cual eres propietario de fuera del juego y ponerla en tu mano o descartar una carta para robar una carta.)

foreignData.flavorText: Les oculomanciens voient l'ingrédient de potion idéal. Les chauves-souris ne sont pas du même avis.
foreignData.name: Spasmœil
foreignData.text:
Vol
Quand le Spasmœil meurt, apprenez. (Vous pouvez révéler une carte de leçon que vous possédez en dehors de la partie et la mettre dans votre main, ou vous défausser d'une carte pour piocher une carte.)

foreignData.flavorText: Gli oculusmanti li vedono come ingredienti perfetti per le loro pozioni. I pipistrelli non la vedono allo stesso modo.
foreignData.name: Pipistrocchio
foreignData.text:
Volare
Quando il Pipistrocchio muore, apprendi. (Puoi rivelare una carta Lezione che possiedi al di fuori della partita e aggiungerla alla tua mano o scartare una carta per pescare una carta.)

foreignData.flavorText: 眼術師にとっては薬品の理想的な材料。コウモリにとってはそうではない。
foreignData.name: ひきつり目
foreignData.text:
飛行
ひきつり目が死亡したとき、履修を行う。（あなたは、ゲームの外部からあなたがオーナーである講義・カード１枚を公開しあなたの手札に加えるか、カード１枚を捨てカード１枚を引くか、どちらかを行ってもよい。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 眼・コウモリ

foreignData.flavorText: 시각술사는 이상적인 물약 재료라고 본다. 박쥐들은 그렇게 생각하지 않는다.
foreignData.name: 씰룩눈
foreignData.text:
비행
씰룩눈이 죽을 때, 학습한다. (당신은 게임 밖에서 당신이 소유한 수업 카드 한 장을 공개하고 그 카드를 당신의 손에 넣거나, 카드 한 장을 버린 후 카드 한 장을 뽑을 수 있다.)

foreignData.flavorText: Os oculomantes enxergam o ingrediente perfeito para uma poção. Os morcegos não veem da mesma forma.
foreignData.name: Virolho
foreignData.text:
Voar
Quando Virolho morrer, aprenda. (Você pode revelar um card de Lição seu de fora do jogo e colocá-lo em sua mão, ou descartar um card para comprar um card.)

foreignData.flavorText: Окуломанты видят в них хороший ингредиент для зелий. Нетопыри не видят в этом ничего хорошего.
foreignData.name: Глазопырь
foreignData.text:
Полет
Когда Глазопырь умирает, выучите урок. (Вы можете показать принадлежащую вам карту Урока вне игры и положить ее в вашу руку, или вы можете сбросить карту, чтобы взять карту.)

foreignData.flavorText: 在视像术士眼中，这是理想的药剂配方。但在巨眼蝠眼中，它们可不这么想。
foreignData.name: 巨眼蝠
foreignData.text:
飞行
当巨眼蝠死去时，温习。（你可以从游戏外展示一张由你拥有的课程牌并置于你手上，或弃一张牌来抓一张牌。）

foreignData.flavorText: 在視像術士眼中，這是理想的藥劑配方。但在巨眼蝠眼中，牠們可不這麼想。
foreignData.name: 巨眼蝠
foreignData.text:
飛行
當巨眼蝠死去時，溫習。（你可以從遊戲外展示一張由你擁有的課程牌並置於你手上，或棄一張牌來抽一張牌。）

name: Eyetwitch
originalText:
Flying
When Eyetwitch dies, learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

rulings.text: If a card is brought into the game from outside the game, it will stay in the game until it ends or until its owner leaves the game, whichever comes first.

If you bring a card into the game from outside the game in a Constructed tournament (or a Constructed game played under tournament conditions), you may select only a card from your sideboard. In casual Constructed games, the card comes from your collection.
If you bring a card into the game from outside the game in a Sealed Deck or Booster Draft event, you may select only a card that is in the card pool that you built your deck from.
If instructed to learn, you may do nothing. Discarding a card and putting a Lesson card into your hand are both optional.

text:
Flying
When Eyetwitch dies, learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
